titles.title: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude working capital in applying the accumulated earnings tax.
Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Accumulated Earnings Tax Modification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude working capital from inclusion in the calculation of accumulated earnings tax.
